nodes.text: The Jafan III was a Naboo passenger starship servicing Legislative Youth Program members during the final years of the Great Peace of the Republic period.

In 65 BBY, the Jafan III was in Hanna City Spaceport, bound for Naboo. Palpatine boarded the starship, and was comparing notes with a young trainee from Keren on their experiences on Chandrila in the central passenger compartment, when a flight attendant informed him that someone had requested his presence in the starport terminal. Palpatine disembarked and was escorted to the Palpatine family starship by a security guard working for his father, and the Jafan III left without him.
